"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5407ba496368720b97d00000#post_5407ba496368720b97d00000
My thing is, well, not to come across as a psycho, but where is the blood? I watched that trailer and it looked to me like the sort of movie that should have red stuff gushing everywhere, especially if as a vampire he's supposed to be so powerful that he turns the tide against an entire army and since its dealing with him in a semi-historical context, where's the brutal impalement?
